title: Johns Hopkins and NOAA Researchers Advance AI for Weather Forecasting
description: A collaborative effort between researchers at Johns Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory (APL) and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) has yielded significant advancements in weather forecasting through artificial intelligence (AI). title: Grammarly Announces Major Shift Toward AI, Resulting in 230 Layoffs
description: In a significant move that underscores the evolving landscape of artificial intelligence (AI) in the workplace, Grammarly, the renowned online writing assistance tool, has announced the layoff of 230 employees. This strategic decision aims to streamline the company’s focus on enhancing AI capabilities to meet the future demands of an AI-enabled workplace. Grammarly’s initiative reflects […]
